pullRequest.title: [IOTDB-749] Handle select * from root OOM
pullRequest.bodyText:
This is a patch for PR #1367  .

Fixed slimit / soffset logical errors in ConcatPathOptimizer
Added integration tests. These tests will fail if the patch is not added

commit.message: fix slimit logical errors in ConcatPathOptimizer

nodes.bodyText: Don't forget to change the MaxQueryDeduplicatedPathNum back to the default value.

commit.message: set default MaxQueryDeduplicatedPathNum value back when IoTDBQueryMemoryControlIT is over
